long_description: For excellent warmth at a super-low weight, wear the women's Patagonia Microsphere Jacket with 60g PrimaLoft(R) One insulation. It'll be your new favorite hiking and climbing partner. Lightweight yet durable Pertex(R) Endurance ripstop-nylon shell features a durable water repellent finish to bead up light precipitation. PrimaLoft(R) One patented microfiber insulation mimics the physical and thermal properties of goose down, but continues to insulate if wet. Full-zip jacket features an internal storm flap and diamond quilting. Articulated elbows provide a natural fit and movement. Zippered handwarmer pockets; internal zippered chest pocket; internal stretch-mesh pocket at torso for holding hat, gloves, etc. Dual adjust hem cords route into hand pockets; elastic-bound cuffs seal in warmth. The women's Patagonia Microsphere Jacket features a regular fit and includes a stuff sack.
short_description: For excellent warmth at a super-low weight, wear the women's Patagonia Microsphere Jacket with 60g PrimaLoft(R) One insulation. It'll be your new favorite hiking and climbing partner.
